column5: I'm a mama too..my mother recently told me something she heard my daughter say..she said she had told her uncle that I was always sick and she didnt want to "step on any cracks" so she wouldnt "break my back" and make me more sick(I've been dealing with chronic pain for years and no doctor can figure it out)..an nownot dealing with crippling anxiety, depression, and panic attacks and she she it all..she was always my reason to keep going but now I feel like I'm doing her a disservice..I feel like a burden to everyone now..
